text: Alexander Baillie Morrison (December 22, 1930 â€“ February 12, 2018) was a Canadian-born American scientist, academic, and public servant. He was a general authority of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) from 1987 until his death. He was born in Edmonton, Alberta. Morrison died in Bountiful, Utah on February 12, 2018 at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Grampa Bill's G.A. Pages: Alexander B. title: Alexander B. Morrison
